title: Connection Error
body:
Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server.

I usually get this note when I have bad/no internet, but right now my internet is perfectly fine.

I tried the flush dns thing but it didnt work.

Any other possible solutions?

And yes I have restarted about 3 times already.

replies.body: Yup. Saw you on the other post and I also live in Texas.
Follow my 2nd post on that thread. ^^

Our network technicians are currently working with Centurylink on resolving the login issues for some players on their network. It may be an issue from our end, Centurylink's end, or a combination of both, but we're working hard on a solution. We're currently posting updates on [this post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/B2VFcQKX-stuck-at-logging-in-after-maintenance) as they're available. 

You should be able to utilize a Virtual Private Network (VPN) temporarily, to bypass the login issue. Some good VPNs to try are [Hotspot Shield](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) or [Cyberghost](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/en_us).

Let me know if you have any questions.
